attributes.action: I would like taxi fares in rother district reduced not increased as announced
attributes.background: Help stop rother council raising meter rates in our taxis this came about I personally lowered my meters in my taxis at town taxis bexhill I would like taxi fares in rother district reduced not increased as just announced it will put us drivers and business owners out of work and lose our livelihood

rejection.details:
The issue you raise is the responsibility of Rother Council, not of the UK Government or Parliament. You could start a new petition about this issue with Rother Council using the link below:

 http://www.rother.gov.uk/article/6878/Petitions-and-e-petitions
